title: Stool Prototype/exhibition Model, 1986
markings: Underside of fiberboard panel:signed in black ink:  "Alessandro"/"Mendini" [in script] within four scrolling lines; "86" to lower right of signature. "VANINI" molded into bottom of circular seat/storage area.
provenance: 2013, acquired by Cooper-Hewitt from donor. 2006, acquired by Irwin and Linda Berman.
dimensions: H x diam.: 42.9 x 30.5 cm (16 7/8 in. x 12 in.)
creditline: The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection
description: Gray, three-legged thin-walled molded plastic form with circular seat having inset circular fiberboard panel with hand-painted decoration of overlapping multi-colored 'dots' (brush strokes) on white ground; three finger holes in center of seat panel allowing it to be lifted out, revealing shallow storage area.

tombstone.epitaph: Stool Prototype/exhibition Model, 1986. Molded thermoplastic, painted fiberboard (seat panel). The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection. 2013-50-8-a,b.
